Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Literary papyrus
Description: Literary papyrus. The remnant, in height, must give us an exact indication of the original height of the columns. However, because of its narrowness, it has only preserved several letters of a column on the left (letters of the longest lines) and the beginning of twenty-four lines of the following column on the right (generally two letters). In the margin, diacritic signs appear at the level of lines 15 and 25 of column II.
